import React, {useState,useEffect} from 'react' const defaultImageSrc = '/img/Imge.jpg' const initialFieldValues ={ cadastroId :0, name: '', categoria:'', imageName:'', imageSrc: defaultImageSrc, imageFile: null } export default function Cadastro() { const [values, setValues] = useState(initialFieldValues) const handleInputChange = e => { const {name, value} = e.target; setValues({ ...value, [name]:value }) } return ( <>
